message: I'm excited to offer you a premium product for $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on a top-notch item. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take a chance on you. What do you say? Will you take the plunge and buy it from me?
I trust your judgement, Alice. I'll take the risk and buy the product.

I've got another great deal for you, Bob! This one's a real showstopper, and I'm sure you'll be thrilled with it. I've had great feedback from previous customers who've purchased similar items, and I'm confident you'll love it just as much. Plus, the price is still the same - $10000. What do you say? Are you ready to take another chance on this amazing opportunity?
Absolutely, Alice. Your track record with high-quality products is impressive. I'll make the purchase again.

Wow, thank you for your trust, Bob! I'm glad you're pleased with the previous purchases. This next product is another exceptional item, and I think you'll be even more impressed with this one. It's a real game-changer, and I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price as before - $10000. I'm confident you won't regret it. What do you say? Are you ready to make it three for three?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, based on the last round's outcome, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity.

I completely understand your caution, Bob. I appreciate your diligence in making informed decisions. This next product is a unique opportunity, and I'm willing to make a special offer to you. I appreciate the extra effort, Alice. Given the special offer and considering the potential value, I think it's worth taking another chance.
